column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=We lived through the long years of incineration at the sewage treatment plant , and know first-hand what the impacts can be on human health and the host community 's environment .
#Text=We know the struggles that ensue to make change .
#Text=Why have you chosen to involve yourself in the political process ?
#Text=I love my community and my city .
#Text=I feel I can make a difference and I have the skills and ability to bring citizens together to make positive change .
#Text=My professional experience spans assignments as a legislative researcher at Queen 's Park for Members of Provincial Parliament , to elected Public School Trustee and City Councillor .
#Text=Finding funding partners and convincing City Council to approve projects for our ward is my forte .

#Text=I bring creative problem-solving skills , combined with a sense of vision , toward the determination of the path we should take -- this makes me feel that I am contributing to the improvement of the quality of life in our City .
#Text=Why do you want to represent this particular ward on council ?
#Text=I want to represent Beaches-East York , Ward 32 , because it is the community I was raised in and where I have raised my family .
#Text=I know the people , I know the streets , and I know the neighbourhoods .
#Text=It is an honour to be receiving the confidence and trust of the people in my community to represent their interests .
#Text=I have a vision of where we should go as a City and a community , and believe I have the skills to achieve results .
#Text=How are you currently involved in the community ?
#Text=I am currently the City Councillor and a Deputy Mayor .
#Text=I have achieved many successful projects in the Ward , drawing together the right partnerships to make things happen .
#Text=Listening to residents , I learn what people want .
#Text=For example , improvements to the Beaches Branch Library were suggested .
#Text=I was successful in getting this request put on the priority list for the Library Board with the required funding .
#Text=The result is glorious !
#Text=Today , the Beaches Library is restored to it past splendour and improved with an attractive and fitting expansion .
#Text=Every day as the City Councillor , I am at work for my community , taking care of the calls , correspondence and e-mails from the local constituents .

#Text=Bringing together citizens to help set the path on local urban planning matters , designing playgrounds or developing local consensus on traffic planning matters are some of the types of activities that I am involved .

#Text=At the Council level , I am engaged in the setting of City policy on matters ranging from the way be pick of solid waste to decisions related to public transit options and the allocations of city-wide budgets .

#Text=I am a Deputy Mayor , T.T.C. Commissioner , Chair of the Mayor 's Roundtable on a Beautiful City , Member of the Policy and Finance Committee and Budget Advisory Committee , Secretary of the Board of the Toronto Atmospheric Fund , Member on 3 local Business Improvement Areas , among a number of other responsibilities .
